title: How to pass parameters to another model
body_html:
I want to pass my pre-trained parameters to my new model. They are equlivalent in terms of number of parameters however, this code does not work and I have not found out a workaround it.
`

params = []
for p in old_G.parameters():
params.append(p)
for i, p in enumerate(new_G.parameters()):
p = params[i]
`

I want to pass my pre-trained parameters to my new model. They are equlivalent in terms of number of parameters however, this code does not work and I have not found out a workaround it.

params = []

body:
I want to pass my pre-trained parameters to my new model. They are equlivalent in terms of number of parameters however, this code does not work and I have not found out a workaround it.
`
>>> params = []
>>> for p in old_G.parameters():
>>>   params.append(p)
>>> for i, p in enumerate(new_G.parameters()):   
>>>   p = params[i]
`
